MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL60 and LL62 postcode areas of Gaerwen and Bodorgan, affecting a number of properties in the widespread area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.08PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:01PM on 23rd February 2021.
